blogPost.excerpt: Not very popular on Twitter? Prefer Android to iPhone? At Scrubhouse, we've got you covered! Come join the conversation with the rest of us.
blogPost.body: Not very popular on Twitter? Prefer Android to iPhone? At Scrubhouse, we've got you covered! Come join the conversation with the rest of us.
blogPost.title: Scrubhouse - Drop-in audio chat for the rest of us
blogPost.author: John Keck

localize.description: 在Twitter上不太受欢迎？更喜欢Android而不是iPhone？在Scrubhouse，我们已经为你准备好了! 快来加入我们的对话。
localize.tagline: 我们其余人的即时语音聊天

localize.description: 在Twitter上不太受歡迎？更喜歡Android而不是iPhone？在Scrubhouse，我們已經爲你準備好了! 快來加入我們的對話。
localize.tagline: 我們其餘人的即時語音聊天

previous.excerpt: Robots are here to save your Valentine's Day! Send a card to your crush — you can always play it cool by saying "Look how awesome AI is") Tweet your cards & how the recipient reacted to @copysmith_ai - 1 brave romantic will win a Doordash dinner for two 💌
previous.title: Robot Cupid by Copysmith - Write cards & poems to everyone you love with AI

localize.description: 机器人来拯救你的情人节了! 发送一张卡片给你的暗恋对象--你可以说："看看人工智能有多厉害"）在Tweet上发布你的卡片以及收件人对@copysmith_ai的反应--1名勇敢的浪漫主义者将赢得双人Doordash晚餐💌。
localize.tagline: 用AI给你爱的人写贺卡和诗。

localize.description: 機器人來拯救你的情人節了! 發送一張卡片給你的暗戀對象--你可以說："看看人工智能有多厲害"）在Tweet上發佈你的卡片以及收件人對@copysmith_ai的反應--1名勇敢的浪漫主義者將贏得雙人Doordash晚餐💌。
localize.tagline: 用AI給你愛的人寫賀卡和詩。

next.excerpt: Each US state has different schedules and policies for vaccine distribution, so it can be hard to figure out when and where to get vaccinated. We built this simple, free tool so educators can easily monitor their eligibility and subscribe for updates.
next.title: COVID-19 Vaccine Tracker for Teachers - A state-by-state educator guide to vaccine eligibility.

localize.description: 美国每个州都有不同的疫苗分发时间表和政策，因此很难弄清何时何地接种疫苗。我们建立了这个简单、免费的工具，使教育工作者可以轻松地监测他们的资格和订阅更新。
localize.tagline: 各州教育工作者对疫苗资格的指南。

localize.description: 美國每個州都有不同的疫苗分發時間表和政策，因此很難弄清何時何地接種疫苗。我們建立了這個簡單、免費的工具，使教育工作者可以輕鬆地監測他們的資格和訂閱更新。
localize.tagline: 各州教育工作者對疫苗資格的指南。
